column2: yadyajjātikam ekahetuviditaṃ tattattadaṅgaṃ tato naivaṃ ced atisañjanaṃ na ca mataḥ sādhyopame 'yannayaḥ || na hi nānāprakārakāryajananaṃ nāma prayatnavaty eva niyatam, vahnyāder api vividhasāmagrīmadhyamadhyāsīnasya dhūmabhasmāṅgārāṅgatāpapākapāratsāraṇavīkṣaṇakṣatiprabhṛtivicitrakāryakriyādarśanāt (dhūmabhasmāṅgārāṅgatāpapākapāradotsāraṇavīkṣaṇakṣatiprabhṛtivicitrakāryakriyādarśanāt) | yadi paraṃ prayatnavato 'dhiṣṭhānenety atra vivādaḥ, na caikasya tatra niyame jñāte kāryāntare 'pi niyamajñānam upapadyate, yathoktaṃ prāk | tato yāvantaḥ prakārā ekahetavo niścitāḥ, tāvantas tasya hetoścetanasyetarasya vā sādhanaṃ yujyante | anyathā stimitendhanasakhena śikhinā gṛhītadhūmavyāptir aparicitatatkāryabhāvair bhasmādibhir api dahanam anuminuyāt | na caivaṃ, tasmāt tajjātibhedo vyakti vyāptigrahaś ca pṛthak pṛthagapekṣyamāṇo yatra kvacit tadgrahaṇena yena kenacid anumānam unmūlayati | kaḥ punar evam āha, yatra kvacid gṛhītavyāptir yena kenacid anumimītām iti, ekadharmānuvṛttivirahe hetor evābhāvāt? na hi tadā bhasmasādhanam avyāpteḥ | nāpi dhūmo 'siddheḥ | kuṭakūṭādau kāryatvam evānyadharmānanuvṛttāv apy anumāne vartamānaṃ hetuḥ syād iti cet, na, kāryatvasyāpi prāgavyāpter vistareṇa sādhanāt | tatra yathā kulagiriḥ kulālavyāpārakāle svabhāvavaikalyādikalitaniyamah, tathā sad api kāryatvaṃ prāmāṇyapravṛttyā dhūmajanmanīva rāsabha iti pramāṇena vyāptigrahavirahe na kaścid viśeṣaḥ | tad ayaṃ ghaṭādau kāryaviśeṣe gṛhītavyāptiḥ sarvato na kāryatāmātreṇa vā vyāpakam anumātu | na tu vyāptigrahaṇasādhanavyavasthayor bhinnādhikaraṇatām atikrāmatīti katham atiprasaṅgopālambhaparihāraḥ?

column2: tasmān naikadharmānuvṛttimātreṇopayogaḥ | kena vā dhūmasaṃbhavinaḥ kāryatvavastutvādayo bhasmani bhasmasād eva kṛtāḥ? santo 'pi vyabhicāriṇa iti cet? nanu savyabhicāro vyāptiviyogād eva, vyāptau tadgandhasyābhāvāt | sa ca vyāpty abhāvaḥ kāryatvenāpi arjita (avarjita) iti tatrāpi vyabhicāro durnivāraḥ | āhaty ādarśanaṃ tu viprakarṣād api syāt |

column2: [298] na tāvatā tadabhāva eva, tanmūlabhūtāyā avyāptes tādavasthyāt | yadi tu vyāptāv eva savyabhicāraḥ, tadā nitarāmavyāptāv ity alaṃ mithyābhiniveśena | tad yady api sādhāraṇadharmā tanmātraṃ vyāptim anādṛtya sādhanam iṣyate, kiṃ na bhinna evaṃ bhūdharādisādhāraṇaṃ dharmam, anādṛtyety atiprasaṅgas tadavasthaḥ?

column2: nāpy ayaṃ nayaḥ sādhyasamānīkṛte kalasādāv apy asti, tatrāpi yathāyathā pratisaraśarābodañcanādiṣu kumbhakārakṛtim upalabhāmahe, tathātathaivam apīdam apy anena sujyata iti pratiyantaḥ paricitakriyebhya eva prakārebhyas tadvyāpāram avadhārayāmaḥ, anyathā taddoṣānativṛttiḥ | tasmād yadi paramārthataḥ prayatnavannāntarīyaka evāyaṃ sakalaprakāraḥ kāryagrāmaḥ, tathāpi svayam akiñcitkara iti pramāṇavṛttyapekṣayā,

column2: nanu bhavaty evāsmākaṃ sarvatra pauruṣeyabuddhiḥ, kṛtabuddhiḥ sā, sādhyabuddhir evānumānam iti niyamaḥ, kathañcit kasyacit tatrāpy abhāvāt | kiṃ ca kṛtabuddhir iti kāryamātrabuddhir vā, puruṣamātrabuddhir vā? yadi kṛtamātrabuddhiḥ, sā bauddhasyāpi siddhā sindhubhūdharādiṣu | sāvayavatvāc ca tadārambhasaṃbhavitvam eva kṛtatvam | atha pauruṣeyabuddhiḥ kṛtabuddhiḥ? sā sādhyabuddhir evānumānam iti cocyate, tatas tadabhāvān nānumānam iti katham ucyamānaṃ nopaplavate ?

column2: [299] tatrāpi na kāryatvādinā kailāsakalasādeḥ kiñcidviśeṣam upalabhāmahe | āha ca, nāpi kaścid viśeṣaḥ kṣityādihetūnāṃ prāsādādihetubhyo yenāmī nirabhiprāyāḥ santaḥ prayatnanirapekṣāḥ pratiniyamavatā ca vyāpāreṇa tadvantaḥ syuḥ, na hy anadhiṣṭhitānāṃ prayatnavatā karaṇadharmāṇāṃ kriyāsu svātantryam upalabdhipūrvam, sarvatra buddhimadadhiṣṭhiteṣv eva prāsādādiprasavopalabdher iti |

column2: atrocyate, neyaṃ kṛtabuddhiḥ siddhāntābhiniveśavāsitabuddhīn adhikṛtya kīrtitā, kiṃ tu saṃvyavahārapragalbhapuruṣamātrāpekṣayā | tasya ca pūrvapratītapratibandhasmaraṇavataḥ kāraṇaparāmarśavaimukhyābhāve bhavaty eva devakulādau tādṛśī buddhir na tu malyamakarālyādau | tad anayor asyā dhiyo bhāvābhāvau na jātibhedam avyavasthāpya sthātuṃ prabhavataḥ, dhūmadvayadarśane 'pi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt | iyaṃ ca kāmaṃ sādhyabuddhir eva, kaḥ punar enām etadvato 'numānanibandhanam āha, tadabhāvād vā bhūdharādau tadabhavam? kiṃ tu jātibhedamātropalakṣaṇārtham asyā bhāvābhāvopanyāsaḥ samānajanāpekṣayā kasyacid durvidagdhabuddheḥ pratibodhasādhanāya | jātibhede hi tāvati siddhe naikatra pravṛttim adhyakṣānupalambham anyatra pratibandhasādhanasamartham iti vaktuṃ samarthaḥ syāt |

column2: tato nāpratibaddhāt sanniveśādeḥ sādhyasiddhiḥ, pratibaddhaś cāsiddha iti katham anumānam ity antato 'numānaniṣedhāyopanyāse 'pi naikasyaiva tadabhāvāt tadabhāva ity uktaṃ bhavati | nanu tathāpy anyasyānumānodayābhāvād anyasyāpi na bhavitavyam ity uktaṃ bhavati | tac ca kathaṃ saṅgatimālambeta? uktaṃ hi, na ca vyāmohād ity ādi | tad ayuktam | samānasādhanasāmagrīsaṃbhave sādhyasyaikapratiniyamānupapatteḥ | yad yena viśiṣṭasāmagrīkaṃ tat tenāviśiṣṭaphalam eva, yathā sādhāraṇadhūmasādhanendhanadahanādisamudāyam pradeśadvayam anyonyam, aviśiṣṭānumānasādhanapratibandhagrahaṇādisāmagrīkaś ca bhavatā saha sāṃvyavahārikaḥ puruṣa iti svabhāvahetuḥ prasaṅgaḥ | bhavato 'pi hi pratyakṣānupalambham eva pramāṇaṃ pratibandhasādhanaṃ devakulasūtradhārādyadhikāreṇa pravṛttam | etac ca parasyāpi sādhāraṇam | asādhāraṇaṃ tu viparyayabādhakapramāṇam eva durabhūyatayā bhavet | tac ca bhavato 'pi nāstīti prāk prakāśitam |

column2: [300] yathāvat smaraṇavato yaddarśanān na tadanumānaṃ na tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ siddho, yathāgnau dhūmapratibandhasyānusmarato gardabhadarśanād agniman anuminvataḥ | na bhavati ca cetanena devakulādipratibandhasmṛtimato malayahimālayādau puruṣānumānam iti kāryānupalabdhiḥ smaraṇakāraṇānusaraṇavaimukhyādipratyayāntarasaṃbhave prācīnapratibandhasādhakapramāṇena viṣayīkaraṇavaikalyaṃ sādhayati | tac ca jātibhedātiśayam antareṇāvāntarabhedavato 'pi, dhūmād gardabhavat |

column2: vyāptigrahaṇasmaraṇayor aparādhe tu neyam iṣṭasiddhiḥ | tadarthaṃ yathāvad grahaṇam | tatra smaraṇāparādhe devakulāntarād api nānumimīta, grahaṇāparādho 'pi pratyakṣāpekṣayā 'saṃbhāvī, ekapratyavamarśayogyatāyā evābhāvād ity ukteḥ | anyathā jaladharādyarthino 'pi kumbhakārasūtradhārādīnapekṣeran | apekṣata eva tatrāpi sūtradhārasthānīyo 'nyo yathā kumbhakārasthānīyaḥ kvacit sūtradhāra iti cet, na, kāryajātivaisadṛśyābhāve kāraṇasāmarthyavaisadṛśyāpekṣānupapatteḥ | anyathā kumbhāntare 'pi na kulālamātreṇa toṣam aśnuvīta | tadvad vā kṛṣīvalaḥ kulālapauruṣāpaneyānāvṛṣṭikaṣṭaḥ syād iti siddha eva tādṛśo jātibhedaḥ, tasmād ekākārapratyavamarśāśnupapatter adhyakṣasādhyā vyāptir viśiṣṭaviṣayatayā na durgrahadoṣam āvahati, yato 'numānābhāve 'pi jātibhedātiśayasyāsiddheḥ siddhasādhanadoṣaḥ syāt |

column2: tataś ca yathāvad grahaṇasiddher yatra nānumānaṃ tatra vyāpter evāgrahād iti nānekāntaḥ | kathaṃ punar anumānahānam eva tādṛśi lokasyāgantavyam (lokasyāvagantavyam) iti cet? uktād eva jaladharārthino 'pi kulālajaṅghāmardanaprasaṅgāt, paracakrākrāntikātarasya vā kulagirijaladhivyavadhim abhilaṣataḥ, cetanamātreṇa vyāptiṃ pratīmo no kumbhakārādyavasthāniyatena tena nāyaṃ prasaṅga iti cet? tadavasthāniyatenaiva vyāptigrahe kīdṛśo doṣa iti kim atra vaktavyam? na ca samayāpakṣālakalāṅkitadhiyaṃ bhavantaṃ prati kācic cintā, api tu lokaṃ prati | so 'pi vyabhicārān na tena pratipadyate iti cet? evaṃ tarhi kalasāntarād api nānumānam ayaṃ kuryāt |

column2: anyatraiva vyabhicāradarśanād atra ko doṣa iti cet? tad etaj jātivaisadṛśye 'sati na labhyate | tataś ca viśiṣṭāyām eva jātau vyāptigrāhi pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttam ato nānyatra tadvyāpārānumānam ity evaṃ kiṃ nocyate, kim atra vyabhicāropakṣepeṇa? avaśyaṃ ca pratyakṣasya pratiniyatajātivyavasāya eṣitavyo 'nyathā vyabhicārāgocaram api pratyakṣaṃ na niyatajātikam iti kalasāntaram apy āskandet | tathā ca sati sa eva doṣaḥ | vyāptigrāhiṇaiva

column2: ubhayor niyataviṣayatve tu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | kevalam idānīm adhyakṣeṇa viśiṣṭaviṣayasvīkārān na vyabhicāropanyāsaḥ saphalaḥ | vyāptigrāhiṇas tu pramāṇasya viśiṣṭaviṣayapravṛttismaraṇādhānārtham upayujyante mūṭhaṃ prati | na tu parito visāriṇī vyāptigṛhītarasya niyataviṣayā kriyate vyabhicāreṇa | nāpy anumānakhaṇṭanamātram uktanyāyād eva | tasmād viśiṣṭaviṣayaiva vyāptiḥ kumbhakārādinā gṛhyate vyabhicāradarśanādarśanāpekṣyapratyakṣasyaikajātyapekṣayaiva pravṛtter iti siddham |

column2: evaṃ cetanamātreṇāpi vyāptijighṛkṣāyāṃ vyabhicāro darśanābhāvāt yajjātini vastuni pratyakṣapravṛttis tad eva tena vyāptam sidhyatīty api siddham | tat kathaṃ sāmānyena vyāptim abhidadhānaḥ samayānuvādamātreṇa nopālambham arhati? yadi tu puruṣamātreṇa vyāptiṃ jighṛkṣor adhyakṣapratikṣepeṇa pramāṇāntaraṃ śaraṇam, tadā naiṣa doṣaḥ | tat tu vicāritam | yadi veśvaraprasādād asya vādino jagataś citrākāraparihāreṇa sarvatraikākāraṃ pratyakṣam udayam āsādayati, taccāsādhāraṇam iti na vyavahārāṅgam | saśarīrāśarīrayoḥ prayatnavator na kaścid viśeṣaḥ karmadharmāpekṣayā pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇe, yato jaladharārthinā kumbhakārānanusaraṇena tatkṛtānumānavirahānumāne prakārāntareṇāpi saṃbhāvanāyāṃ jātibhedaikanibandhanāpratibandhāt siddhasādhanaṃ punar apy āsajyeta | tato jātibhedakṛtas tatrānumānābhāvaḥ saṃsidhyan pratiniyatajātipratibaddham anumānam upapādayati |

column2: viśiṣṭajātipratibaddhapauruṣeyānumānāsiddhau vā anubhavasiddham api jātibhedaṃ śāṭhyād apahnuvānaḥ paralokasya jātibhedānantarīyakeṇa tathā pravṛttyabhāvasiddhena kulālādikṛtatvānumānābhāvena | anyathānumānodayaṃ prasajya jātibhedam āpādyate, yathā sthāṇukākābhyāṃ bhinnaḥ saṃyogo nāma yadi syād dṛśyo loko 'py enaṃ tṛtīyam īkṣeteti ucyate | tathā ca yadi yādṛśaḥ sanniveśo buddhimatpūrvako dṛṣṭas tādṛg eva jaladharādāv api syāt, lokasyāpi puruṣakṛtabuddhiḥ syāt, ghaṭāntaravat |

column2: na caivaṃ tajjātibhedakṛto 'yaṃ vibhāgo 'nyanimittābhāvād ity uktaṃ bhavati | tataḥ kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ sanniveśādyadhiṣṭhātṛanāntarīyakaṃ siddham ity apekṣāyāṃ yāddarśanād akriyādarśinaḥ apīty ādy ucyate, paryāyaparikalpitānekaprakāraparigaṇanagauravaparihārārtham, tatra puruṣakṛtabuddhir iti prayatnavad anumānaṃ vā kumbhakārādivyāpārānumānaṃ vety ubhayasyāpi saṅgateḥ

column2: lokas tu yathādarśanānusārī yajjātikaṃ puruṣapūrvakaṃ paśyati, tattattādṛśā tanumataiva kṛtam avabudhyate, na tu śarīraviratisandeham apy ullikhatīti samānamānavānumānaparyavasānaiva kṛtabuddhir avatiṣṭhata iti | yadāpi yadi kasyacit siddhivaśād āsurīṃ māyālim ālocayato 'cale 'pi kaścid ullekho jāyate, kenāpi kair api vā kaccit kṛto 'yam api bhaved iti, tadāpi kenāpi | karacaraṇāṅgoparakta evātyantaṃ pratibhāti | niścayas tu sudūra eva | na caikajātitve tadupapadyate, dhūmakumbhāder ivānalakulālādeḥ | na ca karacaraṇādivyāpāravirahiṇa ullekho 'pi | na ca tāvatā kṣaṇikādivādino 'numānāpalāpaḥ śakyate | adhyakṣapūrvavyāptigrahasahāyaṃ tu jātiviśeṣāpekṣavṛttikam anumānam ubhayor api sādhāraṇatvān na saṃbhavati laukikaparīkṣayor iti brūmaḥ | yady api ca dvitīyam api laukikam eva, tathāpi kaścid viṣayo 'nabhyastatayā tīvratarābhyūhasāpekṣaḥ kṣmadhiyaḥ (sūkṣmadhiyaṛ) sāṃvyavahārikasyāpi saṃbhavati | tatra pratyakṣākṣamatve 'pi vipakṣabādhakenānumānāntareṇa lokapratītim evāśritya gṛhītā vyāptir anumānaṃ prayojayed iti na kṣatiḥ, yathā yatrārthāpattighoṣaṇāviśeṣo lokasya | tasmāt sādhyabuddhirūpā kṛtabuddhir bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ jātibhedaṃ prasādhayatīti yuktam eva | yadāpi kṛtamātrabuddhiḥ kṛtabuddhiḥ, tadāpi na doṣaḥ | tathāpi kṛtakatvaṃ nāma svajanmany apekṣitaparavyāpāratvam | tac ca na tāvad vṛkṣādivat pratyakṣataḥ kṣitidharādiṣu siddham | parābhyupagamamātrasiddhaṃ tu svatantrasādhanādhikāre 'naṅgam eva |

column2: tato 'numānasiddham āśrīyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭasajātīyaṃ yathā kathañcid vāśrīyate? anantyapakṣe yady anādyupādānaśaktisaṃtanyamānakṣaṇaparamparārūpam eva kāryatvaṃ niyatadeśatayā vyavasthāpyamānaṃ sidhyet, tādṛśāt, kīdṛśī puruṣādhiṣṭhānapratyāśā? dṛṣṭasajātīyaṃ tu tadaṅgam ucitam | cetanācetanādhiṣṭhānakṛtaṃ viśeṣam avadhūya vitatānekakāraṇakalāpamilanalabhyodayaṃ hi puruṣavyāpāram ākarṣed api, milanasya tadadhīnādhyavasāyāt | acetanopādānatvamātram api hi prācīnakrameṇa caritārthaṃ na prakṛtaṃ viśeṣam ākarṣet | etad eva tu kāryatvaṃ loke viditam | tac ca nācalādau siddham iti katham asiddhiparihāraḥ? kevalaṃ na

column2: tad ayam arthaḥ, kiṃ tadadhiṣṭhātṛbhāvābhāvānuvṛttisanniveśādisiddham, yaddarśanād akriyādarśino 'pi lokasya kṛtabuddhir bhavatīti | tato yadi sāvayavā kṛtabuddhir api bhavato bhavati, tathāpi lokasya nāstīti bhinnajātīyatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate | anyathā kumbhakārādināpi bhūdharādivyāpyaṃ pratīyāl loka iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ | tato jātibhedād anyad eva pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ puruṣakṛtaṃ pratītam iti siddham |

column2: yat tūktaṃ kāryatve na kaścid viśeṣa iti | atra sarvasādhāraṇadharmatve 'pi kāryatvasya yadi pratyakṣasādhanā vyāptir abhimatā, tadā sad api tadudāsīnam evety uktaprāyam | yadi tu viśeṣam utsṛjyābhūtvābhāvamātrasya cetanāvyāptir vivakṣitā, tadā pratyakṣavyāpāram apy utsṛjya pramāṇāntaraṃ śaraṇam astv ity api | tadabhāve vā na kiñcit kāryatvena satāpi |

column2: yad apy āha: nāpi kaścid viśeṣaḥ kṣityādihetūnām ity ādi, tad api grāmyajanadhandhīkaraṇamātropayogi na vivakṣitārthagater gatir bhavitum arhati | yathā pārthivatvena vajropalānāṃ lokalekhyatvaṃ sādhayan sandihāne prāha | nāpi kāṣṭhapāṣaṇādibhyo dambholīnāṃ kaścid viśeṣo, yenāmī pārthivāḥ santo lohalekhyatāvirahiṇaḥ syuḥ | na hy alohalekhyānāṃ kadācit pārthivatvam upalabdham | sarvatra lohalekhyatāsvīkṛteṣv eva ghaṭaviṭapādiṣu pārthivatvopalabdher iti | tadvat prakṛtam api vacanaracanāmātram ābhāti |

column2: yathā hi nirabhiprāyatvena sāmānyam anu (anuyantaṛ) sarve puruṣāpekṣakāryārambhabhājaḥ pratīyante, tathā pārthivatvena lohalekhyatvasvabhāvabhājaḥ | yathā ca tathā bahudarśanaṃ vihāya nānyā gatis tathā atrāpi | yathātra kim etal lohalekhyatvaṃ pārthivatvamātrānubandhi, uta pārthivatve 'pi kiñcid viśeṣam apekṣyeti śaṅkā bahuladarśane 'pi, tathā kim acetanam ity eva kāryakriyāsu cetanāpekṣam uta kriyāviṣayāpekṣayaiveti samānam |

column2: kiṃ ca yadi dahanādiṣv iva sūkṣmāvāntarabhedatiraskāreṇaikapratyavamarśayogyatāpekṣayā nāpi kaścid viśeṣa iti ucyate, kārye 'py aviśeṣaprasaktyā dhūmādivat saudhasādhanasyāpi kulagirikaraṇaprasaṅgo durvāraḥ | īśvarasvīkāre kadācid anyathāpi syāt, sarvadā viparyaye śālibījasyāpi śālyaṅkurakaraṇanirākaraṇaprasaṅgaḥ, saudhāntarakriyāniṣedho vā syāt | athātyantajātibhede 'pi nirabhiprāyatvadharmamātrāpekṣayā? tad api viplava

column2: [304] evāyam, na hi kvacit sādhāraṇo dharmo durlabha eva | nāpi tāvatā svabhāvaparabhāvo bhāveṣu viṣāmṛtayor ekakriyāprasaṅgāt kim aniṣṭam asaṃśitāny eva vā saudhādisādhanāni aśakyaparihāranirabhiprāyatvaṃ sādhāraṇam avajñāya yayā svabhāvabhedādhiṣṭhānayā śaktyā kāryabhedam ātyantikam ārabhante tatkṛtaprayatnāpekṣāniyamaniṣedho 'pi yadi syāt kīdṛśo doṣa ity arthapadam etan nāsti kaścid viśeṣa ity ādi |

column2: etena yadāha Trilocanaḥ, nanu keyaṃ kṛtabuddhiḥ kiṃ sādhanabuddhir atha sādhyabuddhiḥ ? sādhanabuddhis tāvat bhavatāṃ siddhaiva, kirmajaṃ lokavaicitryam ity abhyupagamād iti | athottaraḥ pakṣaḥ? tenāyam artho bhavati, nedaṃ kṣityādiṣūpalabhyamānaṃ sādhyānumānasamarthaṃ kāryatvam, kiṃ tv anyad eva sādhyabuddhyajananāt | na caitad yuktam, sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅgāt | dhūmādiṣv api hi śakyam evedaṃ vaktuṃ nāyaṃ vahnyanumitisamartho dhūmaḥ kiṃ tv anyad eva sādhyadarśinaḥ sādhyabuddhyajananāt | tathā ca tāvat sādhanaṃ na sidhyati yāvat sādhyabuddhir na sidhyati, yāvat sādhyabuddhir na sidhyati tāvat sādhanaṃ na sidhyatīti sphuṭaram itaretarāśrayatvam iti tannirastam |

column2: na hi sākṣād asiddhicodanam idam, kiṃ tu yato na vyāvahārikasya kṛtabuddhiḥ sindhvādau ghaṭādivyāptiṃ smarato 'pi tato naikajātitvam iti jātibhedamātrasādhanam idaṃ syāt | tato viśiṣṭajātīyavyāptidvāreṇāsiddhir anekānto veti yuktam eva | tatra ca kṛtabuddhyabhāvo nāma sādhyabuddhyabhāvaḥ sādhanabuddhyabhāvo vety ubhayam api nirvyūḍham |

column2: yad api bhūṣaṇakāraḥ, kṛtakatvena ca pratītau kathaṃ na kṛtabuddhiḥ? sarveṣāṃ prāsādādiṣu api kṛtabuddhir na bhavati, yathā cirantaneṣu prāsādādiṣu vyāptyabhijñasyaiva kṛtabuddhir bhavati, vyāptivimūṭhānām akṛtabuddhir eva, tathā kṣityādiṣv apīti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ | puruṣakṛtabuddhiḥ prāsādādiṣv iva kṣityādiṣu na saṃbhavatīti cet? kiṃ prasiddhāvinābhāvānām utāprasiddhāvinābhāvānām? prasiddhāvinābhāvānām api kiṃ vyāptigrahasmṛtivikalānām, athānyeṣām? abhraṣṭasmaraṇānāṃ tāvad bhavaty eva puruṣakṛtabuddhiḥ | loke api hi vicitraṃ jagat kenacid dhātrā nirmitam ity asti pratītiḥ | vyāptigrahasamṛtivimūṭhānāṃ

column2: [305] api ceyaṃ vedeṣv api puruṣakṛtabuddhir mīmāṃsakānāṃ nāstīty ataś ca tatrāpi puruṣakṛtatvasādhanāyoktā vākyatvādayopy asiddhāḥ syūḥ | kiṃ cānityatvasiddhyarthaṃ yatkṛtakatvasādhanam uktam, tad apy asiddhaṃ syāt | na hi yādṛśyaṃ kṛtakatvādi ghaṭādiṣu dṛṣṭam śrotrāgrāhyatvarūpam, tādṛśyaṃ śabde 'stīti | tasmāt dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikavaidharmyam etat sarvānumāneṣu samānaṃ neśvarānumānasyaiva bādhakam iti, tad apy etenaiva pratyuktam |

column2: yat punaḥ sādhyabuddhim adhikṛtya vikalpitaṃ kiṃ prasiddhānumānabhāvānām ity ādi | atra brūmaḥ | ya ekadā sūtradhārādivyāpāre devakulakalasādisaṃbhavam upalabhya kālāntare kalasādisaṃdarśanāt puruṣakṛtim anumimīte sa kīdṛśo vaktavyaḥ, prasiddhāvinābhāvasmaraṇavān na vā? ādye pakṣe tasyaiva nācalādau puruṣakṛtabuddhiḥ, kulālānumānasyāpi prasaṅgād ity upapāditam | tat katham abhraṣṭadarśanānāṃ tadbhāvaniyamaḥ? tata eva vicitraṃ jagad ityādimatir api na vyāptigrahasmaraṇabalāt, kiṃ tu darśanāntaraprabhavapravādavaśāt, tamaśṛṇvatām abhāvāt, viparītavādavat |

column2: vyāptivimūṭhānāṃ tv ity ādi siddhasādhanaṃ ca | udāharaṇam api pāpīyaḥ, kṛtabuddhyabhāvasya jātibhedamātropadarśanaparatvāt | na ca vādiprativādyapekṣayā tadbhāvābhāvacintety uktam, svayaṃ vā abhiniveśenānyathāpi saṃkalpasaṃbhavāt | pratyakṣāpekṣayā tu vyāvahārikādhikāreṇa cinteyam | tasya cāviditavedādisaṃketasya vaidikavākye tatpraticchandena ca racitam aparaṃ śṛṇvato nipuṇam api nirūpayaś (nirūpayāaṃś) cintaya tāvat kīdṛśo viśeṣāvasāyaḥ, kalasakuliśādivat sarvaprakārāṇāṃ puruṣaiḥ kāraṇadarśanāt, pratyakṣasvabhāvānāṃ śabdānāṃ pratyakṣabhedakalpane dhūmādiṣv api prasaṅgāt | tataś ca,

column2: na ca laukikavaidikavākyayor vaijātyasaṃbhave samayamātreṇa parājetavyo Mīmāṃsakaḥ | na ca pratyakṣākṣiptavyāptikaṃ vākyatvam eva tatra śaraṇam | kṛtakatve tu yad uktaṃ tad api cintitaṃ cintayiṣyate cānantaram iti | nanu tathāpi tadvyāpte 'pi kārye kāryatvād dṛṣṭam itaratrāpīti yathā ghaṭādi prayatnavannāntarīyakam, tathā pṛthvīdharādy api syād iti cet? nanūktam atra kāryatvādi vidyamānam api tatrāśakyavyāptigrahatayodāsīnam eveti tenābhidyamānād api kāryāntarān na yatnavataḥ sparśo 'pi labhyate, kevalaṃ kāryaṃ kāryam iti śabdamātram abhidyamānam avaśiṣyate | tad yadi tad eva dvārāntareṇa śaraṇīkṛtam āyuṣmatā tatra sākṣād dūṣaṇāśravaṇāt, tadā tad api kākabhakṣaṇaprāyam ity ādarśayann āha:

column2: etena yad apy uktaṃ, nāpy atra śabdasāmyād acetanopādānatvasya samāropeṇa sādhyasiddhiḥ, anityatvādinā kṛtakatvādiṣv iva pratyāsatter ihāpi vāstavatvāt | na ca jātibhedo dharmiṇor dharmayoḥ sarvatra vāstavīṃ pratyāsattiṃ bhinatti, kṛtakatvānityatvayoḥ śabdaghaṭajātibhedena pratyāsatter abhāvaprasaṅgād iti | tad apy anavakāśam | na hi nagādāv acetanatvasya sopādānatvasya samāropaṃ brūmaḥ | tanmātraṃ tu vyāptibahirbhāvād asatkalpam iti |

column2: yadi cānyad evācetanopādānatvaṃ cetanāpekṣi siddham anyad eva cācalādau dṛśyata iti kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ vibhāga iti cet? upādhikṛtaḥ | kiṃ na bhinnadharmiṇor dharmayor apīti cet, na, vaiṣamyāt | acetanopādānaṃ dhūmasthānīyaṃ kāryahetvabhimānāt na ca kaścit tasya dharmibhedād bhedam āha: yadā tv acetanopādānatvād acalādau cetanāpekṣatvaṃ vivakṣitam, tadā dhūmatvena dhūmo vahnimān ity evaṃprāyā sthitiḥ | evaṃ ca sati dhūmadvaye dhūmatvayor bhedaḥ prasañjanīya iti kathaṃ sāmyam? evam evāstv iti cet, na, bhidyamāno hy upādhir upādhimantam

column2: nanu na dṛṣṭas tāvad dharmibhedena dharmabheda iti cet? yadrūpapuraskāreṇa pratibandhasādhakapramānavṛttis tasyābhede bhidyamānāpi dharmijātir abhinnavad ābhāsamānā na bādhikā | tadbhede tu tadgataṃ dharmāntaram abhidyamānam api bhinnavad ābhāsamānaṃ na sādhakam iti nyāyaḥ | anyathā jaladharārthināpi kumbhakārasya paryeṣaṇāprasaṅgaḥ | tadapāye 'pi vihāyasi balāhakodayadarśanān neti cet, na, tatprabhavasyaiva ghaṭasyeva tasya maruto kṣepaḥ kiṃ na saṃbhāvyate? atha ca vāridhāritvamātram ubhayatra dṛṣṭam iti yathā tatra saṃjñābhedamātrabhedo vyavasthāpyate, tathātrāpīti yuktam | pratibandhaniścayo hi pramāṇaviṣayasvabhāvaniyame sati bhavati, tadviruddhāniyamarūpaṃ ca sādhāraṇatvam |

column2: pramāṇapratibaddho hi niścayas tadviṣayasvarūpollaṅge 'pi bhavan pramāṇāpramāṇasādhyaḥ syāt | na caivaṃ, tasmān nānekāntaḥ | nāpy asiddhir adhyakṣavyāpārānusārāt | tad iha pānṭutvasyāgnivyabhicāro dṛṣṭa iti dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyaśūnyatāniṣedha eṣaḥ | ata eva nānumānam iti pratibandhābhāvād aniścayaphalam idam ubhayatra | na tu siddhavyāptikayor dahanapāṇḍutayor vyabhicāreṇa sādhanavaidhuryam, vyāptisiddhāv anumānāpavādasyāśakyasādhanatvāt vyabhicārasyaivāyogāt | sarvopasaṃhāravatī hi vyāptiḥ, tadbhāve tadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ syāt?

column2: tato 'yam arthaḥ | yathā pāṇḍutvān nāgnimattve 'numānaṃ tasya tatrāpratibandhāt | sa ca vyabhicāreṇābhivyaktaḥ | anyathā tatrāpy anumānam aṅgīkṛtyaiva svastham āsīt | sa ca vyabhicāraḥ pramāṇaviṣayasvarūpetarasādhāraṇaṃ dharmaṃ sarvam apratibaddhatve niyatam ādarśayatiti yathoktasādhāraṇatvākṛṣṭād apratibandhāt | tathaiva yathā kāryatvādimātrād api na cetanādhiṣṭhānānumānam iti | ato vyabhicāradarśanam upakārakam eva parasya | tasmāt pramāṇaviṣayasvarūpaparamārśāt tathāvidhopādhikam eva kāryatvādisādhanaṃ dhiya iti siddham | tathāvidhasya ca vāstava eva pratyāsattibheda iti saṃjñāmātraṃ śaraṇam āpatitam |

column2: tato 'bhūtvābhavanābhidhānadharmamātrasya bhūtvābhavanena dharmeṇa vyāptisādhakaṃ dharmiṇo yadi jātibhedam udāsayati dhūmasyāgninā vyāptisādhakam eva mahānasādi, tadā prastute kim āyātam yatra pratyakṣavyāpārāpekṣayā jātibhedaniṣṭhaiva vyāptigṛhītirītir iti? yadi tu prakṛte 'pi kāryavastustomagatāḥ kāryatvādaya eva dharmāḥ pratītavyāptayaḥ syuḥ, tadāyaṃ na doṣaḥ | kevalam upāyaprakāradvayasyāpy ayogād ayuktaiva vyāptir iti darśitam | tatra viparyayabādhakapramāṇaparicayas teṣām asaṃbhavo, bauddhagandher eva kasyacit tathā yatnadarśanāt | na ca prakṛte vaktuṃ śakya iti tatrāsthām avadhūya | pradeśāntare ca,

column2: yadā hi bādhātmakoddeśenāpi pravartamānaḥ sāmānyenaiva vyāptiṃ sādhayati, tadā kuto mṛnmayāt kulālānumānaṃ kuryāt kāraṇamātrasya siddheḥ? yadāpi pratyakṣāpekṣayā hetuviśeṣeṇa kulālena karaṇavyāpāropadheyaviśeṣasya kumbhādikāryaviśeṣasya vyāptis tadāpi kutas tat prasaṅgaḥ? yadāpy adhyavasāyamātrāpekṣayā sāmānyena viśeṣasya tadāpy ayaṃ dūrataraḥ | evaṃ tu vyavasthāto 'nyathāvyāptigrahaṇe viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya bhavatīti kathaṃ mṛnmayāt kulālānumānam aprasaṅgi? tatkāryakumbhādyapekṣayā atyantavisadṛśād api prasaṅge kathaṃ kiyatāpy aṃśena pratyāsannāt na syāt? tathā caivaṃ sajātīyād apy avāntarabhedānusāripratyakṣavyavasāyāpekṣayā nānumānaṃ pratibandhāniścayāt tadā kaiva vārtā vijātīyād? Atyantavijātīye dṛṣṭavyāptikasyeti daṇḍāpūpanyāya eṣa iti darśayituṃ mṛnmayagrahaṇam |

column2: [310] nanūbhayathā vyākhyāne 'pi vyabhicārād eva nānumānaṃ, tat katham atiprasaṅga iti cet? uktakrameṇopakāraka eva vyabhicāro 'smākaṃ na bādhakaḥ | tathā hi pramādvayavyāpārātikrame 'nantaraprakārabahirbhāve vā pratijñātapratibandhaniścayābhāvasādhaka eva vyabhicāra iti | api ca, vyabhicāro nāma sāmānyena gṛhītāyā vyāpter niyataviṣayāpekṣayā vighātam ātanoti, atha vyāptigrahaṇam eva tan na bhavatīti vibhāvayati, atha saty api vyāptiprasare 'numānamātraṃ khaṇṭayati, ata evābādhitaviṣayatvam api liṅgalakṣaṇam ākhyātam iti pakṣāḥ |

column2: tṛtīye tu vyāptau satyām eva vyabhicāreṇānumānam apāsyata iti mahīyasīyam ayogaparamparā | kevalam atra pakṣe etad āpatitaṃ yadīdam atra sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ vyabhicarya na sthitaṃ tadā sādhyaṃ sādhayatīti | etac ca sādhyavidhuraṃ sarvārthasākṣātkāriṇo nānyaḥ kartuṃ śaktaḥ | sa hi ya eva dharmī tathāvidhamadhyamadhiśayito na bhavati tam eva vā vyabhicāragocaratayā anumānabhājanīkaroti, sarvavipakṣānīkṣaṇe tu vyabhicāraś ca vyāptidurgrahaṇam eva sādhayatīti kāryamātravyāptiḥ prakṛtakāraṇaviśeṣeṇāsaṃbhaviny eva sādhur iti |

column2: aparigaṇito nāma vastuvyāpāraviṣayo 'parigaṇitatam astv aviṣayaḥ | tatra ka evam anātmīyakāryajātinikarasya pratyekaṃ vyabhicārāt dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā svakāryajātiṣv eva niyantuṃ hetum apāravyāpāraḥ pārayate? tathā ca sati yasyaiva sākṣād anīkṣito vyabhicāraḥ tadaiva tasya gamakam āśaktam | tadā śaṅkāsambhavān neti cet, na, kvacid atīndriye tarhi niścayam ayaṃ kuryāt | yajjatīyoddeśena pravṛttam adhyakṣaṃ sāmānyaviṣayam avasthātaṃ (avasthāpitaṃ) tatra kaḥ sandeha iti cet? evaṃ tarhi parāparatadīyavyāpyajātiṣu tathaiva saṃśayapravṛttipratyanīkapramāṇavṛttyanusaraṇe āyātas tṛtīyapādāpatito 'rthaḥ | tasmān na kāraṇaviśeṣeṇa buddhimatā kāryamātrasya vyāptiḥ pratyetuṃ śakyeti,

column2: yādṛkṣo 'sau śarīrādiyogī adhiṣṭhātā ceti | śeṣaṃ subodham | tādṛśaś ca pratyakṣabādhādidoṣaviṣaya ity ākūtam | nanu śarīravaty api cetanatvaṃ dṛṣṭam itaratrāpi saṃbhavati iti yathā śarīriṇā vyāptam kāryādi sidhyati, tathābhimatenāpi ity atrāpi prāg uktanyāyāt saṃjñāmātrād avaśiṣyamānāt sādhanamanoratham unmathnann āha, vastubhede kumbhādau prasiddhasya kulālāder yā vācakaḥ śabgdaś cetana iti tanmātrād abhidyamānasyābhimatasya pramāṇavyāpārāpekṣayā dūrīkṛtasya na yuktānumitir iti vyāptābhimatāt vastuna iti prakṛtam arthāpannaṃ vā katham ivety āha,

column2: [312] adhyakṣam anyavyāptiṃ pratikṣipatīti nānumānam ucyate, tathā cetanamātrapratikṣepeṇāpi pratyakṣaṃ kiṃ na tad anumānaṃ nirasyati? etena yadā dṛśyam api kāryāntaraṃ tiraskaroti pratyakṣaṃ tadā kaiva kathā dṛkpathātiriktasya cetanamātrasyeti? astu tāvad vyāpyāpekṣayā vibhāga eva, loke tathaiva pratīteḥ, anyathātiprasaṅgāc ca |

column2: vyāpakāpekṣayā tu yady eṣa niyamo na syāt ko doṣa ity āśaṅkyā pūrvoktam eveti prasaṅga bhaṅgyantareṇa taruṇayati, anyathety ādi | valmīkasyeti valmīkajantor ity arthaḥ | tatkṛtir iti ghaṭādikṛtiḥ | ayam arthaḥ, yadi viśeṣeṇāpi vyāptim avasāya cetanamātraṃ sāmānyam anumātavyam, tadā kumbhādikaraṇasya kulāle niyatasya cetanamātraparyavasitatvāt ghaṭāder api valmīkajantuḥ kartānumeyaḥ syāt, yathā hi kumbhādeḥ kumbhakāreṇa vyāptigrahaṇe caitanyamātreṇāviśeṣāt tasyāpy anumānam evaṃ valmīkaukaso 'pi caitanyenānyāviśeṣāt kiṃ nānumānam? yadā ca śarīriṇā vyāptigrahe śarīriṇo 'py anyasya pratikṣepaḥ, tadā (katiratyanteti mātṛkāsthaḥ pāṭhaṛ) ka vārtātyantavisadṛśasyeti | na cātra bahutvenopayogaḥ, ekātmano 'pi yaitanyād iti valmīkasyeti nirdeśaḥ | etena dhūmāder api jāṭharāder anumānākṣepo vyaktaḥ | vyabhicāracarcāyāṃ ca pūṛvavat sarvam āvartanīyam iti |

column2: yad uktaṃ, prayatnavatā yad vyāptaṃ sanniveśādi tan na siddhaṃ sindhubhūdharādau, yac ca siddhaṃ tan na vyāptam iti tatraitat syāt, nanu jātyuttaram idaṃ dharmabhedavikalpanāt, tato yathā yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ ghaṭavad iti kṛte kaścid āha, yadi ghaṭagataṃ kṛtakatvaṃ hetus tad asiddhaṃ śabde, śabdagataṃ tv anityasaṃghāte ghaṭapaṭādāv abhāvād viruddham | atha sapakṣavad vipakṣe 'pi nāstīti matiḥ, tadā asādhāraṇam anaikāntikam iti | na ca tāvatā kṛtakatvaṃ tattvato 'śaktam eva anityatvasādhane, tathedam api | tathā hi yac ca siddhaṃ tan na vyāptam ity anena sapakṣāvṛtter virodhaḥ, vipakṣād api nivṛttipakṣe vā asādhāraṇatvam ākṛṣṭam iti | atha prakṛtakāryānurodhād adūṣaṇam evedam udghoṣyate? tathā sati kṛtakatvāder api asādhanatvaprasaṅgaḥ sūtrakāravirodhaś ca, kāryasamasaṃjñayā asya dūṣaṇasya tena pratijñānāt | yadāha,

column2: tad etad ubhayam apy asāram, prathamapakṣasya tāvat pūrvam eva pratikṣepāt | uktaṃ hi vyāptisādhakapramāṇapuraskṛtasvarūpasyābhede bhidyamānā api saṃbandhino vidhūtabhedā iva bhāsamānā na bādhakaḥ | tasya tu bhede abhedino 'pi bhinnavad ābhāsamānāḥ kāryatvādayo dharmā na tadvyāpakasya sādhakā iti | vyāptigrahaṇaprakramaś ca dvividho darśitaḥ | tatra yadi nāśena kṛtakatvasyeva viparyayabādhakabalād buddhimatāpi kāryatvāder avinābhāvagrahaḥ syāt, tadā abhūtva bhavanamātram iva sanniveśādimātram adhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ pramāṇam iti kas tatra dharmibhedena bhindānaḥ sādhanaṃ śobheteti yujyate jātyuttaram iti |

column2: yadi tu pratyakṣanupalambhavaśāt sanniveśādikam iva kṛtakatvam api vyāptam avadhāryeta tadā śabde 'pi śādhanatvaṃ kṛtakatvādeḥ kena nivāryeta, jātiviśeṣollekhenaiva pratyakṣānupalambhavyāpārasya pariniṣṭhitatvāt? anyathā dhūmagatā api kāryatvādayo jātiviśeṣānavacchedena dahanāvinābhāvinaḥ sidhyanto nāśakyaparihāram atiprasaṅgam upanīya svāsthyam āsādayeyuḥ | kāryāntarasya vyabhicāropakṣepo 'pi kṣodiṣṭhaḥ pratividhiḥ | tadā hi yatraiva sākṣād vyabhicārānupalambhaḥ tad eva sādhanaṃ jātam iti kiyal lāghavaṃ doṣabhārasya?

column2: asmākaṃ tu dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭam eva rūpaṃ vyāptam avadhāryate yathā mahānasaparidṛṣṭaṃ dhūmaṃ dhvajādhīnam (dhūmadhvajādhīnam) avadhārya sādhyadharmigataṃ sāmānyenānupraviśyāpi sādhyadharmiṇi dhūmam upalabhya yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir dṛṣṭo yathā mahānasa iti evam agnim anumīmahe, tathā prayatnavatā ghaṭādijātīyamātrasyaiva vyāptisiddhāv api yatra kāryatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra prayatnavatā kṛtir iti vaktuṃ śakteḥ | tataś caivam api sādhyasiddher avirodhāt ko 'nurodhaḥ sarvopasaṃhāravyāptigrahaṇasya? maulasādhanānarthakyasādhanasyeti cet? evaṃ tarhi vyaktam idam āyātaṃ jātyantare vyāptim ādāya jātyantarād evānumānam iti | yadi paraṃ vyāpyaliṅgayoḥ saṃjñāsāmyam apekṣya, tathā ca sati na vastuliṅgam uktaṃ bhavati | kevalaṃ kāryādiśabdavṛttimātram eva | tac cāyuktam ity ādarśayann āha - prayatnavato,

column2: nanu kāryādīti na śabdamātrabhūtvā (śabdamātram, abhūtvā) bhāvitvasāmānyasyānugamasaṃbhavāt, gośabdas tu svargādiṣu rucimātraśaraṇo na kiñcid artham anugamya vartate iti mahān viśeṣaḥ | etad api plavata eva, na hy abhūtvābhāvitvamātraṃ (nāntaravan nāntarīyakam iti mātṛkāyām) vannāntarīyakaṃ (prayatnavannāntarīyakaṃ) siddham, yena tadanugamasamāśrayaḥ phalaṃ syāt | siddhau ca punaḥ sa eva saropasaṃhāra iti kim anena parihṛtaṃ svīkṛtaṃ vā? tasmāt tad api sāmānyam kāryajātibhedena bhedam āveśayato na kaścid vastvanugama iti śabdamātram eva sādhanam āśritaṃ bhavatīti paśyāmaḥ | tataś ca na kaścid viśeṣo gatvena vāgāder viṣāṇasādhanād asyeti |

column2: evaṃ dṛṣṭānte 'py ayam eva ślokaḥ | tadā ca jātyantara ity anyadhūmajanmani prasiddhasya vahner iti yojyam, yadi sarvopasaṃhāraparihāraḥ | yadā tu sarvam eva dhūmarūpam ekākārapratyavamarśavaśād ekīkṛtya vyāptim avadhārayati, tadā na śabdamātrasāmyam | sa eva vyāptaḥ

column2: [315] artho 'trāpīti na sādhyasiddhivirodhaḥ | nāpy evaṃ maulahetuvaiphalyopalambhasaṃbhavaḥ | na hi yatra yatra sādhanaṃ tatra tatra sādhyam iti sāmānyena pravṛttāpi buddhir abhimatadeśakālādibhedam āspadīkartuṃ prabhuḥ | ato viśeṣasya pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayīkaraṇāya na pakṣadharmam anālambyāsituṃ śaknuyāt | tat katham aphalaṃ maulam aṅgam?

column2: tasmād vyāptigrahe sarvopasaṃhāraparihāriṇo 'pi dhūmo 'pi nāgner anumāpaka iti lābham icchato mūlasyāpi nāśaḥ | na hi yatraiva dhūmajanmani vyāpṛto vahnir upalabdhas tad eva deśāntare 'pi, kevalaṃ so 'pi dhūmaśabdavācyo 'yam apīti śabdasāmyam avatiṣṭhata iti na gotvena vācaḥ śṛṅgasādhanād asyāpi kaścid viśeṣaḥ | nanu tathāpi kīdṛśī punar iyaṃ vācaḥ śṛṅgasiddhir adhyakṣakṣiptatvāt svayam eva hi,

column2: yan na gopālāṅganājanasyāpi sāmpratam, evaṃ ca samīhamānas tad api śraddadhīteti tadanurūpam uttaraṃ parihāsaparam abhidadhāno vacasi viṣāṇānumānena sakalam anucitānumānamātram upalakṣayati | yadā hi dahanādīnām api gardabhādibhyo 'pi labhyāvakāśam anumānaṃ tadā kasya kasmād apratītir ity ākūtam, yadi paraṃ sākṣād adhyakṣabādhā mā bhūt? nanu vyāptavastusādhāraṇābhidhānavṛttes tadvyāpiniścayaprasaṅgaprakrame ko 'vakāśo gardabhād dahanānumānasya? na hi dahanvyāptavastusādhāraṇā dhūmabhasmādiśabdā gardabhe saṃbhavina iti cet, na, vastvādiśabdenāpi śabdasāmyasiddher ity etac ca,

column2: na tu pratibuddhavastuvṛttitaḥ sādhyasiddhāv abhimatāyāṃ śabdādivat sarvasiddhiḥ ullaṇṭhamātraphalā, kiṃ tu tattvata eva vyāpakasya sarvasiddhir iti bhāvaḥ | tad evaṃ dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭamātrasya vyāptivacane vacanasāmyamātraparatantrā siddhir asiddhir evāpatatīti tāttvikasiddhinibandhanavastusādhanānveṣiṇā sarvopasaṃhāriṇy eva vyāptir upapādayitavyā | sā ca dvidhāpi na sanniveśādibhyo buddhimato 'numānaṃ mānabhājanīkaroti | tanmātrasiddhāv api vā nābhimatā viśeṣasiddhiḥ, yataḥ śreyo 'rthibhir ity artham abhidhīyamānam īśvarābhidhānasya kovidair ādriyeteti saṃkṣepataḥ prakaraṇārthaḥ | tasmāt sthitam etat, tādṛśī pramāṇasaṃmate anitye 'py apramāṇateti ||
